thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Wataniya Insurance Signs Insurance Coverage Deal With Saudi's NCB

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Wataniya Insurance Signs Insurance Coverage Deal With Saudi's NCB
text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - WATANIYA INSURANCE CO:
* SIGNS AGREEMENT WITH NATIONAL COMMERCIAL BANK TO PROVIDE AUTO INSURANCE COVERAGE FOR VEHICLES SOLD BY BANK UNDER FINANCIAL LEASING PROGRAM
* UNDER THE DEAL CO WILL PROVIDE ONE-YEAR COVERAGE STARTING FROM FEB 01
* ANNUAL INSTALLMENTS OF CONTRACT ARE EXPECTED TO GENERATE OVER 5 PERCENT OF COMPANYâ€™S REVENUE
* EXPECTS FINANCIAL IMPACT FROM THE DEAL TO APPEAR FROM Q1 2018 Source: ( bit.ly/2E7pZBQ ) Further company coverage:
